def: One who recites; also, a book of extracts for recitation.
One of the suckerlike rootlets of such plants as the dodder andivy. R. Brown.
One who gauges; an officer whose business it is to ascertainthe contents of casks.
Belonging to the Hexactinellinæ, a group of sponges, havingsix-rayed siliceous spicules.
Worthy of reward. Sir G. Buck.
Of or pertaining to the polynemes, or the family Polynemidæ.
Belonging to a creature; having the qualities of a creature.[R.]
In an elective manner; by choice.
